name: Extract specific pages from PDF files
description:
Extract specific pages or page ranges from PDF files. Specify pages like "1-3" for a range or "1,5,8" for specific pages to create new PDFs with only the pages you need.

What you'll need:
- CustomJS account (sign up at customjs.space)
- Google Drive with PDF files
- Know which pages to extract

Use cases:
- Extract invoices from batch files
- Remove unwanted pages
- Split large PDFs
- Create smaller documents

Get your CustomJS API key at customjs.space/account

Created by CustomJS
Contact: support@customjs.space
